ygData.messageBody:
It seems to me that Verant does a lot of things weird. Now a lot of
people compare the game to AD&D, so I'll do the same. It seems
absurd to me to think that if the party kills a red dragon in AD&D,
for example, that they should expect the same kind of loot over and
over again. Seems to me the game should have been more random in
terms of where items were found. Sure jboots should be rare, but I
agree, to make them only appear on 1 person is just insane. If they
are that rare, then they are unique, and then as soon as that person
got killed the owner would become the only person in the whole world
to have them. These are called artifacts and are unique. But this
kind of game has no room for artifacts. In order to fully remove
camping, they need to stop making the items appear to just one
creature. At the very least it seems that they could post something
saying that "the jboot location has changed. so-and-so no longer has
them."

>I am certain that
>unless I buy a pair off EBay or in-game, I will never own them.
>
>they are no drop, so there is no way you can buy them from someone you have
>to loot the corpse yourself for the boots.
>
>
>And for those of you who have the boots and will
>swear to me that it took you only a day to get them, I congratulate you on
>your accomplishment.
>
>
>It took my group 29 hours to get 4 pair of boots. I looted the first pair,
>and had it within an hour. But the rest came with 6 hour differences or so.
>
>
>I do beleive that items such as JBoots should be put on more than one NPC.
>To have them only on Drezlna, is absolutely ridiculous. We had two kills of
>ours stolen when we camped that 29 hours. Verant should put items such as
>JBoots and Rubicite Armor on SEVERAL NPCs throughout Norrath. That way,
>more
>people will have a chance to own such items.....but I suppose that would
>make too many people happy and Verant doesn't appear to have the happiness
>of the customer in mind.
>
>
>I agree that the servers need to capped. I even think 1000 on a server is
>alot...I would love to see servers capped at 500. Wow,
>would THAT be something =)
>
>
>
>
>Lanadina
